title: Orbox
content:
Another forum I frequent posted a link to this, I thought it was fun:

http://www.rubilon.kulichki.com/games/orbox.swf

Use the arrow keys, try to get the light box to the red cube. It's fun!

title: Re: Orbox
content: It's really cool! Interesting game idea.You hear in your mind: GAAARRRRRGG!

title: Re: Orbox
content:

title: Re: Orbox
content: good game i got to level 12 5520 pointsI am the bad you are the ugly There is no good

title: hehe
content: I think there's only 25 or 26 levels.  I finished with a pretty low score--evidently you get points for going over a new route the first time, but going over the route a 2nd time deducts your score!  :-P  I didn't realize that, and so I spent too much time SUBTRACTING when I thought I was ADDING!

title: Re: hehe
content: Fun! I only got to level 13, and have no idea of how to beat it (don't tell me!!) [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-grin.gif[/img] -Genius314

title: Re: hehe
content:
Good little timewaster, but the levels seem a little obvious. [img]http://www.classicgaming.com/cc314/msgboard/emotikeen-smile.gif[/img] -------------------------------
If something's HARD to do, then it's NOT worth doing. -Homer J. Simpson
